LanguageData.GR_DuplicateBear.label: duplicate bear genes
LanguageData.GR_DuplicateBear.description: Duplicate bear genetic material in exchange for a lot of organic pulp.
LanguageData.GR_DuplicateBoomalope.label: duplicate boomalope genes
LanguageData.GR_DuplicateBoomalope.description: Duplicate boomalope genetic material in exchange for a lot of organic pulp.
LanguageData.GR_DuplicateFeline.label: duplicate cat genes
LanguageData.GR_DuplicateFeline.description: Duplicate cat genetic material in exchange for a lot of organic pulp.

LanguageData.GR_DuplicateChicken.description: Duplicate chicken genetic material in exchange for a lot of organic pulp.

LanguageData.GR_DuplicateRodent.description: Duplicate rodent genetic material in exchange for a lot of organic pulp.

LanguageData.GR_DuplicateMuffalo.description: Duplicate muffalo genetic material in exchange for a lot of organic pulp.

LanguageData.GR_DuplicateHumanoid.description: Duplicate humanoid genetic material in exchange for a lot of organic pulp.
LanguageData.GR_BaseIncubator.label: manufacture empty incubator
LanguageData.GR_BaseIncubator.description: Manufacture an empty incubator using Steel and an organic growth compound.
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesBear.label: extract genes from a bear
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesBear.description: Extract genetic material from a bear corpse.
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesChicken.label: extract genes from a bird
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesChicken.description: Extract genetic material from any bird corpse.
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesBoomalope.label: extract genes from a boomalope
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesBoomalope.description: Extract genetic material from a boomalope corpse.
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesMuffalo.label: extract genes from a muffalo
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesMuffalo.description: Extract genetic material from a muffalo corpse.
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesWolf.label: extract genes from a canid
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesWolf.description: Extract genetic material from a wolf, warg or dog corpse.
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesRodent.label: extract genes from a rodent or leporid
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesRodent.description: Extract genetic material from a rodent or leporid corpse.
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesFeline.label: extract genes from a feline
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesFeline.description: Extract genetic material from a feline corpse.
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesInsectoid.label: extract genes from an insectoid
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesInsectoid.description: Extract genetic material from an alien insectoid.
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesReptilian.label: extract genes from a reptile
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesReptilian.description: Extract genetic material from a reptile.
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesHuman.label: extract genes from a humanoid
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesHuman.description: Extract genetic material from a humanoid.
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesThrumbo.label: extract genes from a thrumbo
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesThrumbo.description: Extract genetic material from a thrumbo corpse.
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesMechanoid.label: extract genes from a mechanoid
LanguageData.GR_ExtractGenesMechanoid.description: Extract genetic material from a mechanoid corpse.
LanguageData.GR_ExtractNonSpecializedGenes.label: extract non-specialized genes from any animal
LanguageData.GR_ExtractNonSpecializedGenes.descriptio: Extract non-specialized cells from any animal. These genes can't be used to create animal hybrids. They can probably be used in a gene recombinator to turn them into more useful genetic materials, though.
LanguageData.GR_CraftBearGenetrainer.label: craft hybrid bear genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_CraftBearGenetrainer.description: Craft hybrid bear genes genetrainer. Genetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. This will require the repurposing of any mech serum.
LanguageData.GR_CraftBoomalopeGenetrainer.label: craft hybrid boomalope genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_CraftBoomalopeGenetrainer.description: Craft hybrid boomalope genes genetrainer. Genetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. This will require the repurposing of any mech serum.
LanguageData.GR_CraftCatGenetrainer.label: craft hybrid cat genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_CraftCatGenetrainer.description: Craft hybrid cat genes genetrainer. Genetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. This will require the repurposing of any mech serum.
LanguageData.GR_CraftChickenGenetrainer.label: craft hybrid chicken genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_CraftChickenGenetrainer.description: Craft hybrid chicken genes genetrainer. Genetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. This will require the repurposing of any mech serum.
LanguageData.GR_CraftMuffaloGenetrainer.label: craft hybrid muffalo genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_CraftMuffaloGenetrainer.description: Craft hybrid muffalo genes genetrainer. Genetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. This will require the repurposing of any mech serum.
LanguageData.GR_CraftRodentGenetrainer.label: craft hybrid rodent genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_CraftRodentGenetrainer.description: Craft hybrid rodent genes genetrainer. Genetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. This will require the repurposing of any mech serum.
LanguageData.GR_CraftWolfGenetrainer.label: craft hybrid wolf genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_CraftWolfGenetrainer.description: Craft hybrid wolf genes genetrainer. Genetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. This will require the repurposing of any mech serum.
LanguageData.GR_CraftReptileGenetrainer.label: craft hybrid reptile genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_CraftReptileGenetrainer.description: Craft hybrid reptile genes genetrainer. Genetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. This will require the repurposing of any mech serum.
LanguageData.GR_CraftInsectoidGenetrainer.label: craft hybrid insectoid genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_CraftInsectoidGenetrainer.description: Craft hybrid insectoid genes genetrainer. Genetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. This will require the repurposing of any mech serum.
LanguageData.GR_CraftThrumboGenetrainer.label: craft hybrid thrumbo genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_CraftThrumboGenetrainer.description: Craft hybrid thrumbo genes genetrainer. Genetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. This will require the repurposing of any mech serum.
LanguageData.GR_CraftMechanoidGenetrainer.label: craft hybrid mechanoid genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_CraftMechanoidGenetrainer.description: Craft hybrid mechanoid genes genetrainer. Genetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. This will require the repurposing of any mech serum.
LanguageData.GR_CraftImplantSteelWireMesh.label: craft hybrid implant steel wire mesh (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_CraftImplantSteelWireMesh.description: Craft hybrid implant steel wire mesh.
LanguageData.GR_CraftImplantPlasteelWireMesh.label: craft hybrid implant plasteel wire mesh (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_CraftImplantPlasteelWireMesh.descript: Craft hybrid implant plasteel wire mesh.
LanguageData.GR_CraftImplantUraniumWireMesh.label: craft hybrid implant uranium wire mesh (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_CraftImplantUraniumWireMesh.descripti: Craft hybrid implant uranium wire mesh.
LanguageData.GR_BearLeg.label: animal Implant: bear leg (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_BearLeg.description: Craft a prosthetic animal leg strengthened with bear muscles, and ending in a powerful bear claw that adds a powerful melee attack.
LanguageData.GR_LizardLeg.label: animal Implant: bionic lizard leg (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_LizardLeg.description: Craft a bionic animal leg reinforced with tough lizard skin.
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboLeg.label: animal Implant: bionic thrumbo leg (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboLeg.description: Craft a bionic animal leg reinforced with muscle tissue from a powerful thrumbo.
LanguageData.GR_ScytherTail.label: animal Implant: scyther tail (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_ScytherTail.description: Craft a scyther tail by attaching a scyther blade to an animal's tail. Uhmmm... where did you put all those old scyther blades? You asked around and no caravans seem to be trading them nowadays... Well, you will have to manufacture one using a cocktail of different genes. Note that only creatures with a natural tail can use this.
LanguageData.GR_MechaTail.label: animal Implant: mechanoid tail (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_MechaTail.description: Craft an advanced mechanoid tail, even more powerful than the old scyther tail. Note that only creatures with a natural tail can use this.
LanguageData.GR_CanidEye.label: animal Implant: canid eye (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_CanidEye.description: Craft an eye implant that uses genetic splicing with canid genes to give an old (or damaged) eye decent vision. This implant is not meant to replace healthy eyes.
LanguageData.GR_InsectileEye.label: animal Implant: insectile eye (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_InsectileEye.description: Craft a bionic implant which gives the creature compound insectile eyes. Compared with simple eyes, compound eyes possess a very large view angle, and can detect fast movement.
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboEye.label: animal Implant: bionic thrumbo eye (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboEye.description: Craft a bionic eye reinforced with specialized photoreceptors from a powerful thrumbo.
LanguageData.GR_RodentEar.label: animal Implant: rodent ear (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_RodentEar.description: Craft an ear implant that uses genetic splicing with rodent genes to give an old (or damaged) ear decent hearing. This implant is not meant to replace healthy ears.
LanguageData.GR_MothTympanalOrgan.label: animal Implant: moth tympanal organ (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_MothTympanalOrgan.description: Craft a bionic implant adding a moth tympanal organ to the creature's ear. Moths can hear sounds of a higher frequency than any bat can produce.
LanguageData.GR_MechaReceptors.label: animal Implant: mechanoid auditory receptors (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_MechaReceptors.description: Craft mechanoid auditory receptors that can scan a really wide band of frequencies.
LanguageData.GR_RodentNose.label: animal Implant: rodent nose (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_RodentNose.description: Craft an implant that uses genetic splicing with rodent genes to give an old (or damaged) nose decent smelling. This implant is not meant to replace healthy noses. Can't be installed on birds and insects.
LanguageData.GR_InsectoidPheromones.label: animal Implant: insectoid pheromones (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_InsectoidPheromones.description: Craft an implant that uses genetic splicing with alien insectoid genes to give the ability to detect pheromones, thus improving the olfactory system. Can't be installed on birds and (ironically) insects.
LanguageData.GR_MiniatureThrumboHorn.label: animal Implant: miniature thrumbo horn (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_MiniatureThrumboHorn.description: Craft a bionic implant adding a small thrumbo horn where the creature's nose used to be. This implant acts as a nose, allowing the creature to breathe and smell, and can be used by the creature in melee. Birds, insects, and creatures that already have a thrumbo horn don't have enough space on their skull to install this implant.
LanguageData.GR_WolfJaws.label: animal Implant: wolf jaws (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_WolfJaws.description: Craft an implant that uses genetic splicing with wolf genes to give an old (or damaged) jaw decent functioning. This implant is not meant to replace healthy jaws.
LanguageData.GR_InsectMandibles.label: animal Implant: insect mandibles (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_InsectMandibles.description: Craft a bionic implant adding insect mandibles to the creature's face. Insect mandibles improve manipulation and eating, while also working as an offesive weapon
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboJaws.label: animal Implant: bionic thrumbo jaws (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboJaws.description: Craft a bionic implant adding thrumbo jaws to the creature's mouth. These creatures devour trees, so you can imagine their jaws are up to the task.
LanguageData.GR_MuffaloSpine.label: animal Implant: muffalo spine (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_MuffaloSpine.description: Craft a spine implant that uses genetic splicing with muffalo genes to give an old (or damaged) spine decent functioning. This implant is not meant to replace healthy spines.
LanguageData.GR_CrocodileSpine.label: animal Implant: crocodile spine (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_CrocodileSpine.description: Craft a bionic implant adding a sturdy crocodile spine to the creature's skeletal system.
LanguageData.GR_MechaSpine.label: animal Implant: mechanoid spine (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_MechaSpine.description: Craft a bionic implant adding a plasteel structure with active mechanites to the creature's skeletal system.
LanguageData.GR_ChickenBrains.label: animal Implant: chicken brains (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_ChickenBrains.description: Craft an implant that uses chicken brain tissue to patch damaged neurological pathways. This implant is intended for brain-dead creatures.
LanguageData.GR_MonitorLizardBrain.label: animal Implant: monitor lizard brain (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_MonitorLizardBrain.description: Craft a bionic implant using monitor lizard brain tissue. This highly intelligent reptile has very quick reflexes.
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboBrain.label: animal Implant: bionic thrumbo brain (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboBrain.description: Craft a bionic brain implant using thrumbo neural tissue. Superb intelligence and reflexes.
LanguageData.GR_BoomalopeHeart.label: animal Implant: boomalope heart (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_BoomalopeHeart.description: Craft an implant that uses chemfuel to pump blood through the animal's body. This implant is intended for creatures whose heart is failing catastrophically, since it is less efficient than a natural heart.
LanguageData.GR_ChitinousHeart.label: animal Implant: chitinous heart (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_ChitinousHeart.description: Craft a bionic heart implant using a reinforced shell of insectoid chitin for protection. This is a heart designed to take a beating. Pun intended, but it's the last one, I promise .
LanguageData.GR_MechaHeart.label: animal Implant: mechanoid heart (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_MechaHeart.description: Craft a bionic heart strengthened by the action of active mechanites.
LanguageData.GR_MuffaloLung.label: animal Implant: muffalo lung (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_MuffaloLung.description: Craft an implant that uses muffalo genes to increase breathing capacity.
LanguageData.GR_BearLiver.label: animal Implant: bear liver (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_BearLiver.description: Craft an implant that uses bear genes to improve function of the liver. Specially useful for those alcoholic chickens.
LanguageData.GR_ChickenKidney.label: animal Implant: chicken kidney (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_ChickenKidney.description: Craft an implant that uses chicken genes to improve function of the kidney. Birds have large kidneys. Yep, you learned that today.
LanguageData.GR_BoomalopeStomach.label: animal Implant: boomalope stomach (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_BoomalopeStomach.description: Craft an implant that uses boomalope genes to improve function of the stomach.
LanguageData.GR_CraftBearClaws.label: Human Implant: bear claws
LanguageData.GR_CraftBearClaws.description: Craft bear claws, a hybrid implant containing humanoid and bear DNA that adds a powerful melee attack.
LanguageData.GR_CraftDiggingBearClaws.label: Human Implant: digging bear claws
LanguageData.GR_CraftDiggingBearClaws.description: Craft digging bear claws, grotesque but powerful hand blades that have been modified to be used in mining operations, increasing both speed and yield.
LanguageData.GR_CraftBearMuscleTissue.label: Human Implant: bear muscle tissue
LanguageData.GR_CraftBearMuscleTissue.description: Craft bear muscle tissue, a hybrid implant containing humanoid and bear DNA that adds strength and stamina.
LanguageData.GR_CraftHibernationModule.label: Human Implant: hibernation module
LanguageData.GR_CraftHibernationModule.description: Craft hibernation module, a biochip that modifies the brain to reduce the need for sleep.
LanguageData.GR_CraftOvipositor.label: Human Implant: ovipositor
LanguageData.GR_CraftOvipositor.description: Craft an ovipositor, a hybrid implant containing humanoid and chicken DNA that... are you sure this is a good idea? Really? Free range human eggs? Ugh...
LanguageData.GR_CraftMuffaloMuscles.label: Human Implant: muffalo muscles
LanguageData.GR_CraftMuffaloMuscles.description: Craft muffalo muscles, a hybrid implant containing humanoid and muffalo DNA that strengthens the subject's muscular system.
LanguageData.GR_CraftMuffaloMammaries.label: Human Implant: muffalo mammaries
LanguageData.GR_CraftMuffaloMammaries.description: By implanting muffalo mammaries into a colonist... Wait, what??? Who came up with this idea????? Anyway... this implant allows your colonist to be milked... Ugh, I give up.
LanguageData.GR_CraftMuffaloSkin.label: Human Implant: muffalo skin
LanguageData.GR_CraftMuffaloSkin.description: Craft muffalo skin, a synthetic skin substitute that is much thicker and a much better insulator than human skin. This provides a measure of defense but, more importantly, makes the subject more resistant to low temperatures.
LanguageData.GR_CraftBoomalopeNodules.label: Human Implant: boomalope nodules
LanguageData.GR_CraftBoomalopeNodules.description: Craft boomalope nodules, a hybrid implant containing humanoid and boomalope DNA that causes a huge explosion if the subject dies violently.
LanguageData.GR_CraftChemfuelStomach.label: Human Implant: chemfuel stomach
LanguageData.GR_CraftChemfuelStomach.description: Craft chemfuel stomach, a reinforced bionic stomach that uses a combination of gastric acid and chemfuel to efficiently digest food.
LanguageData.GR_CraftChemfuelHeart.label: Human Implant: chemfuel heart
LanguageData.GR_CraftChemfuelHeart.description: Craft chemfuel heart, a reinforced bionic heart that acts like a miniature 4-stroke internal combustion engine powered by chemfuel to pump blood through the body.
LanguageData.GR_CraftWolfMuscularFibers.label: Human Implant: wolf muscular fibers
LanguageData.GR_CraftWolfMuscularFibers.description: Craft wolf muscular fibers, which can modify the subject's legs by weaving hybrid human/wolf muscle fibers within the base tissue, giving her a significant strength and speed boost.
LanguageData.GR_CraftDevouringJaws.label: Human Implant: devouring jaws
LanguageData.GR_CraftDevouringJaws.description: Craft devouring jaws, a set of improved teeth designed to rapidly chew and ingest any kind of food. Leaves kind of a mess, though...
LanguageData.GR_CraftNeuronReinforcement.label: Human Implant: neuron reinforcement
LanguageData.GR_CraftNeuronReinforcement.description: Craft neuron reinforcement. A biochip using animal stem cells to reinforce the natural abilities of human neurons, increasing learning and research speed.
LanguageData.GR_CraftMousePheromones.label: Human Implant: mouse pheromones
LanguageData.GR_CraftMousePheromones.description: Craft mouse pheromones, a bionic vomeronasal organ that allows the subject pheromonal communication with other animals, increasing the chance of taming and training them successfully.
LanguageData.GR_CraftMoleratNerveDampener.label: Human Implant: mole-rat nerve dampener
LanguageData.GR_CraftMoleratNerveDampener.description: Craft mole-rat nerve dampener, a biochip that reduces pain sensitivity, allowing the subject to survive pain shock.
LanguageData.GR_CraftBunnyEars.label: Human Implant: bunny ear
LanguageData.GR_CraftBunnyEars.description: Craft bunny ear. This huge leporid ear gives amazing enhanced hearing. Also, super kawaii!
LanguageData.GR_CraftCompoundEye.label: Human Implant: compound eye
LanguageData.GR_CraftCompoundEye.description: Craft compound eye. This hybrid humanoid / insectoid eye provides improved vision in a wide range of different wavelengths, including those usually outside the human range, completely modifying the way the subject perceives his surroundings.
LanguageData.GR_CraftInsectoidAntennae.label: Human Implant: insectoid antennae
LanguageData.GR_CraftInsectoidAntennae.description: Craft hybrid humanoid / insectoid feeling appendages that can be implanted in a subject's head, completely modifying the way the subject "sees" and feels the surrounding world. The experience may be slightly overwhelming due to sensorial overload.
LanguageData.GR_CraftPsychicDampeners.label: Human Implant: psychic dampeners
LanguageData.GR_CraftPsychicDampeners.description: Craft psychic dampeners, artificial hearing aids that block psychic emanations, providing considerable resistance to mechanoids' psychic attacks.
LanguageData.GR_CraftKidneyToxicFilters.label: Human Implant: kidney toxic filters
LanguageData.GR_CraftKidneyToxicFilters.description: Craft kidney toxic filters, bioelectronic kidney prosthesis that greatly improve the efficiency of the subject's kidneys by using insectoid tissue, providing resistence to toxic substances.
LanguageData.GR_CraftHumanThrumboHorn.label: Human Implant: thrumbo horn
LanguageData.GR_CraftHumanThrumboHorn.description: A genetically modified thrumbo horn that can be implanted in a subject's forehead. Nasty.
LanguageData.GR_CraftThrumboSkin.label: Human Implant: thrumbo skin
LanguageData.GR_CraftThrumboSkin.description: Craft thrumbo skin, a synthetic skin substitute that is much thicker and a much better insulator than human skin. This provides a lot of defense and makes the subject more resistant to extremes of temperature.
LanguageData.GR_CraftVenomousFangs.label: Human Implant: venomous fangs
LanguageData.GR_CraftVenomousFangs.description: This hybrid implant substitutes the subject's jaw with a set of venomous fangs. Useful in combat, but not very comfortable.
LanguageData.GR_CraftIguanaScales.label: Human Implant: iguana scales
LanguageData.GR_CraftIguanaScales.description: Craft iguana scales, a synthetic skin substitute that is much thicker and a much better insulator than human skin. This provides a measure of defense but, more importantly, makes the subject more resistant to high temperatures.
LanguageData.GR_CreateBearBoomalopeIncubator.label: bear / boomalope incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateBearBoomalopeIncubator.descript: Fill an incubator with genes from a bear and a boomalope
LanguageData.GR_CreateBearChickenIncubator.label: bear / chicken incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateBearChickenIncubator.descriptio: Fill an incubator with genes from a bear and a chicken
LanguageData.GR_CreateBearMuffaloIncubator.label: bear / muffalo incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateBearMuffaloIncubator.descriptio: Fill an incubator with genes from a bear and a muffalo
LanguageData.GR_CreateBearWolfIncubator.label: bear / wolf incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateBearWolfIncubator.description: Fill an incubator with genes from a bear and a wolf
LanguageData.GR_CreateBearCatIncubator.label: bear / feline incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateBearCatIncubator.description: Fill an incubator with genes from a bear and a feline
LanguageData.GR_CreateBearmoleIncubator.label: bear / rodent incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateBearmoleIncubator.description: Fill an incubator with genes from a bear and a rodent
LanguageData.GR_CreateBoomalopeChickenIncubator.label: boomalope / chicken incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateBoomalopeChickenIncubator.descr: Fill an incubator with genes from a boomalope and a chicken
LanguageData.GR_CreateBoomalopeMuffaloIncubator.label: boomalope / muffalo incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateBoomalopeMuffaloIncubator.descr: Fill an incubator with genes from a boomalope and a muffalo
LanguageData.GR_CreateBoomalopeWolfIncubator.label: boomalope / wolf incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateBoomalopeWolfIncubator.descript: Fill an incubator with genes from a boomalope and a wolf
LanguageData.GR_CreateBoomalopeCatIncubator.label: boomalope / feline incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateBoomalopeCatIncubator.descripti: Fill an incubator with genes from a boomalope and a feline
LanguageData.GR_CreateBoomsquirrelIncubator.label: boomalope / rodent incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateBoomsquirrelIncubator.descripti: Fill an incubator with genes from a boomalope and a rodent
LanguageData.GR_CreateChickenMuffaloIncubator.label: chicken / muffalo incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateChickenMuffaloIncubator.descrip: Fill an incubator with genes from a chicken and a muffalo
LanguageData.GR_CreateChickenWolfIncubator.label: chicken / wolf incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateChickenWolfIncubator.descriptio: Fill an incubator with genes from a chicken and a wolf
LanguageData.GR_CreateChickenCatIncubator.label: chicken / feline incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateChickenCatIncubator.description: Fill an incubator with genes from a chicken and a feline
LanguageData.GR_CreateChickenrabbitIncubator.label: chicken / leporid incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateChickenrabbitIncubator.descript: Fill an incubator with genes from a chicken and a leporid
LanguageData.GR_CreateMuffaloWolfIncubator.label: muffalo / wolf incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateMuffaloWolfIncubator.descriptio: Fill an incubator with genes from a muffalo and a wolf
LanguageData.GR_CreateMuffaloCatIncubator.label: muffalo / feline incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateMuffaloCatIncubator.description: Fill an incubator with genes from a muffalo and a feline
LanguageData.GR_CreateMuffaloratIncubator.label: muffalo / rodent incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateMuffaloratIncubator.description: Fill an incubator with genes from a muffalo and a rodent
LanguageData.GR_CreateWolfCatIncubator.label: wolf / feline incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateWolfCatIncubator.description: Fill an incubator with genes from a wolf and a feline
LanguageData.GR_CreateWolfbeaverIncubator.label: wolf / rodent incubator
LanguageData.GR_CreateWolfbeaverIncubator.description: Fill an incubator with genes from a wolf and a rodent
LanguageData.GR_CreateRodentCatIncubator.label: feline / rodent incubator

LanguageData.GR_ExtractMilkFromMilks.label: extract milk from hybrid milks
LanguageData.GR_ExtractMilkFromMilks.description: Extracts regular milk from hybrid milks, maintaining nutrition value but potentially losing special qualities.
LanguageData.GR_NeutroamineFromSkin.label: extract neutroamine from Spidersnake shed skin
LanguageData.GR_NeutroamineFromSkin.description: Spidersnake shed skin can be ground and processed at a drug lab to extract minute amounts of neutroamine.
LanguageData.GR_CraftBoarTuskSculpture.label: craft a boar tusk statuette
LanguageData.GR_CraftBoarTuskSculpture.description: Paragon boar tusks can be carefully carved and crafted into a small statuette. Cozy!
LanguageData.GR_CraftMechanoidInterfaceChip.label: make mechanoid interface chip
LanguageData.GR_CraftMechanoidInterfaceChip.descripti: Make a mechanoid interface chip. This is a very wasteful and expensive method, but useful if you can't get any mechanoid ship parts dropping from the sky.
LanguageData.GR_PulpWood.label: extract organic pulp from wood
LanguageData.GR_PulpWoodBulk.label: bulk extract organic pulp from wood
LanguageData.GR_PulpWoodBulk.description: Bulk extract organic pulp from wood.
LanguageData.GR_PulpWoodExpensive.label: extract organic pulp from wood
LanguageData.GR_PulpWoodExpensive.description: Extract organic pulp from wood. This recipe is more expensive than the one in the pulper, which can be built with the Genetic Engineering research.
LanguageData.GR_PulpCorpse.label: extract organic pulp from fresh corpse
LanguageData.GR_PulpCorpse.description: Extract organic pulp from corpse. Corpses can't be rotten or desiccated to extract organic pulp from them.
LanguageData.GR_PulpProduce.label: extract organic pulp from produce
LanguageData.GR_RecycleIncubator.label: extract organic pulp from unwanted incubator
LanguageData.GR_RecycleIncubator.description: Extract organic pulp from unwanted incubator. Careful, this operation will grab the closest incubator. Plan accordingly.
LanguageData.GR_RecombineGenes.label: recombine genes
LanguageData.GR_RecombineGenes.description: Recombine genes from one or several species to get new ones.
LanguageData.GR_RecombineSerums.label: recombine serums
LanguageData.GR_RecombineSerums.description: Recombine genetic material from 5 animal serums to synthesize a random paragon serum. Non-specialized genetic material can also be used for this recipe.
LanguageData.GR_CryofuelToFuel.label: make chemfuel from cryofuel
LanguageData.GR_CryofuelToFuel.description: Make a batch of chemfuel by converting cryofuel.
LanguageData.GR_ExtractMechaMilk.label: process mechanoid milk
LanguageData.GR_ExtractMechaMilk.description: Extract useful materials from mechanoid milk.
LanguageData.GR_ExtractMechaMilk.jobString: Extracting useful materials from mechanoid milk.
LanguageData.GR_ExtractSerumBear.label: extract paragon serum from a bear
LanguageData.GR_ExtractSerumBear.description: Extract paragon serum from a bear corpse.

LanguageData.GR_ExtractSerumBoar.description: Extract paragon serum from a boar corpse.

LanguageData.GR_PulpBones.label: extract organic pulp from bones
LanguageData.GR_PulpBones.description: Extract organic pulp from bones. You can get bones from butchering living creatures.
LanguageData.GR_RecombineDroneGenome.label: recombine drone genome
LanguageData.GR_RecombineDroneGenome.description: Recombine normal insectoid genetic material to get specialized Drone Genomes.
LanguageData.GR_RecombineWarriorGenome.label: recombine warrior genome
LanguageData.GR_RecombineWarriorGenome.description: Recombine normal insectoid genetic material to get specialized Warrior Genomes.
LanguageData.GR_RecombineRoyalGenome.label: recombine royal genome
LanguageData.GR_RecombineRoyalGenome.description: Recombine normal insectoid genetic material to get specialized Royal Genomes.
